high_descs: Turn around and head towards the white counter with green drawers and several bottles on top.
Pick up the bottle with the black cap on the right side.
Turn around and head towards the white toilet.
Place the bottle with the black cap on the top left of the toilet tank to your left.
anns.task_desc: Place a bottle on top of the toilet.

high_descs: Turn right, then turn to the counter on your right.
Pick up the bottle of lotion to the right.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the lotion on the back of the toilet next to the toilet paper.
anns.task_desc: Put the lotion on the back of the toilet.

high_descs: turn to the right, walk and face the counter top with green shelves and yellow spray bottle on top
pick up the pink lotion pumper bottle on the left of the counter top
turn around and face the toilet
put the lotion pumper bottle on the toilet tank top in front of the toilet paper roll already there
anns.task_desc: put a lotion pumper bottle on the toilet tank

high_descs: Turn around and walk to the bathroom counter in front of the two spray bottles.
Pick up the perfume bottle from the counter.
Turn around and walk to the toilet.
Put the perfume bottle on top of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Move the perfume bottle from the counter to the toilet.

high_descs: Face the opposite direction to go to the countertop behind you.
Get the soap dispenser from the right side of the countertop.
Face the opposite direction and walk to the toilet.
Put the soap dispenser on the toilet tank lid.
anns.task_desc: Move a soap dispenser to the back of a toilet.

high_descs: turn around, walk to the vanity
grab the purple bottle on the vanity
turn around, walk to the toilet,
put the bottle on the toilet
anns.task_desc: move the purple bottle from the vanity to the toilet
